website_summaries.verdict: A versatile 10-sheet paper shredder that can also handle paperclips, staples, credit cards, and CDs.
pros: This super cross-cut paper shredder features a 9-inch throat and a 5-gallon bin
It has a separate cutter for discs to prevent wear and tear of the main cutters
cons: The power cycle is rather limited: 4 minutes on and 40 minutes off

customer_reviews.title: Am pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is quiet, and seems powerful. Shreds the paper to tiny pieces. I lined the basket with a clear transparent 10 gallon trash bag (available from Costco) so when emptying these tiny pieces don't fly all over the place. The basket I did not buy the Fellows canola oil bottle for $9. Instead, to oil the cutters I use a small syringe and bought a small bottle of plain canola oil at the supermarket for $2, and now I can also fry some eggs for much lower costs :-).
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Quiet high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality shredder. I have owned 3 shredders in my life , this is my 4th one. The big difference between this one and the others I have owned in the past is; the sharpness of the blades, the way it easily grabs the paper, and my favorite part is how quiet it is! I also love the pull out tray and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Fellows paper shredder was shipped used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it in July, but just opened it last week. This paper shredder is not new, it’s been used and died not work. It looks like something is stuck where the blades are. The casters were already on which we are suppose to install.. I would like to return for a new one. Please advise. Thank you, Maria Yaloff
customer_reviews.author: maria yaloff

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shredder and received it today. Opened box and the wheels were broken. Had a note attached to it that said not working. Also the shredder looked like it had been used and paper shred was inside the container. I was totally shocked to say the least and returned it the same day.
customer_reviews.author: maui mama

customer_reviews.title: Oh how wonderful it is to shred papers without them getting jammed
customer_reviews.text: Oh how wonderful it is to shred papers without them getting jammed. I went through 3 shredders before buying this one, they all were a waste of money. I would recommend this shredder to anyone who needs to shred even one piece of paper. I like how the paper comes out in tiny pieces instead of strips, making the shredding more secure. This is a great addition to my office supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t live up to advertised capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Had same Fellowes shredder for home office for 22 years. Could easily shred 10-12 pages with large opening to insert papers. It finally bit the dust. After looking through options bought this model. Arrived yesterday and already it’s scheduled to be returned. Can shred 4 papers at a time for about 10 minutes before overheating. So no where near what it’s capabilities are advertised. Slot for inserting papers is exactly 8.5 inches so you spend more time straighting out and carefully inserting items to be shredded. If there’s a positive it’s quieter than my older shredder but I’d rather have the noise and productivity than what i’m Getting from this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mack

customer_reviews.title: Had this 3 months and it jammed on 4 pages ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this 3 months and it jammed on 4 pages to shred at a time. One wheel also broke off - poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: SNS

customer_reviews.title: Not very robust
customer_reviews.text: After months of occasional use, I needed to shred some old medical records. I estimated that I fed it about 10 sheets at a time for about 15 minutes, then it jammed. After clearing the jam, it immediately overheated, so I shut it down until the next day. I discovered then, that the auto-feed feature was no longer working. I believe I bought this in April or August 2018. It didn’t last long, I’m really disappointed. I paid over $100 for this item. I should have purchased the $3 insurance!
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: great shredder
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy construction, and functions quickly and quietly. Waste hopper is easily accessible and well designed to allow for quick removal. Only fault I can find with it so far is i'd prefer the feeder width to be a little wider; it seems to be pretty precise @ 8.5" now and sometimes the paper i shred isn't so precise. Still, this is just an annoyance, and not enough to ding the rating imo.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I shredded 7 bags of documents
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I shredded 7 bags of documents. Only had to let it cool down twice, maybe three times. Very satisfied. Now I use it daily for only a few items. It is a nice looking shredder and is pretty quiet. You absolutely need to buy the oil. Very important.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: At this price point it's great. I have had no issues with chips on ...
customer_reviews.text: At this price point it's great. I have had no issues with chips on the floor or anything like that. I empty the bucket at about 3/4 and there is no issue with mess. It eats plastic cards and CDs fine. Don't over-stress it by pushing too much through at once and it's fine for home use. I wish the auto off feature delayed a second or two more. When shredding a big pile of papers you have to follow in the papers lickety-split or it keeps turning off and on as you feed the papers through. I've run up to about 15 minutes duty cycle with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Calif

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's a bit pricey for a shredder, ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's a bit pricey for a shredder, but you get what you pay for. I purchased the small Amazon-branded micro-shredder previously, which promptly died in a smokey ruin for no reason other than being left alone for a weekend. This Fellowes model is a tad bigger, but extremely quiet in comparison. That it hasn't spontaneously combusted, is just icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roglev

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I owned a smaller paper shredder in the past, which very quickly proved inadequate even to my modest household needs. It kept jamming, and the paper shreds weren't all that small. In comparison with that, this Fellowes shredder is altogether different. In weeks of heavy use it has jammed only once, and that was when my kid fed several sheets in crookedly, causing them them to fold over and bunch up. If handled properly (and lubricated from time to time), it works great. And the resulting shreds and completely inaccessible to anybody who might be looking for your confidential info. I'm glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Gallup

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: You know when you see those few review outliers that give a normally 4-5 star item 1 star? Add another one of those to the list for this item. Box arrived in spotless condition. Unpackaged everything and set it up in my office. Plugged in the unit and turned on the switch... and it's dead. No lights, not motor, no nothing. Checked the power strip, that's working fine. Still nothing from the shredder. Wait a few minutes and try again... still dead. Try plugging it directly into the wall.... still dead. Got a refund, because I'm not too keen on rolling the dice on a getting a functional replacement. Will look at another brand. Once bitten and all that.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love this shredder. It's great for paper composting.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this paper shredder. It is surprisingly powerful and the pieces are incredibly small. I'm using it for composting paper and thin cardboard boxes. Now, I should note that the shredder says it is not designed for shredding cardboard and it tells you not to shred cardboard in it, but I purchased this shredder after watching a youtube review where the owner was using the shredder for shredding cardboard for vermicomposting. It easily shreds paper and easily shreds cereal boxes, paper milk jugs, and thin single walled cardboard boxes cut into paper sized pieces. I definitely wouldn't try anything double walled. I'm keeping it well lubricated with shredder oil and it's doing an amazing job.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: This is the Cadillac of paper shredders!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Fellows 62MC. It's very quiet. It has casters and the two front can lock. It makes confetti out of all my junk mail. I even put around 10 CC's in the shredder and it handled them perfectly, one at a time. Right now I am waiting for squeeze bottles to put oil into. They suggest to oil every time the bin is emptied. I empty the bin after every use. I also bought the warranty for it. With electronics it's worth it. If it breaks down, I will update my review. I hope it doesn't. It's a beast!
customer_reviews.author: Reezie

customer_reviews.title: It shreds single-ply cardboard well for the worm bin
customer_reviews.text: It shreds single ply cardboard well for the worm bin. I have already shredded 5 boxes from amazon. If you rip the double ply cardboard in half it shreds that too. It also shreds paper well. I have less need of that, but it is useful. I like that the paper can be pulled out with a removeable bin, so I don't have to lift the shredder gears like I did on the old shredder that died. Nice work, Fellows. The remainder after shredding is smaller than I expected. I thought I'd get centimeter squares, but it is much finer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is perfect for the home office. I had to replace one that was from Amazon Basic which also performed well. This Fellowes shredder is by far better and much quieter. It is a micro shredder and the pull-out front basket makes it easier to empty and easier to insert plastic trash bags to catch the shreddings. I highly recommend this for any home or home office use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shredder I have owned. This Fellowes 62MC cuts very small pieces for extra security. It is very quiet and the pull out, large size, waste basket makes emptying the shredded paper a breeze. My previous large Fellowes shredder lasted over 20 years and was not as easy to empty. I wish I had bought this one sooner. I also have a small lift-off Fellowes shredder, which still works, but this new one is so efficient to use, it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Broken on 3rd Piece of Paper
customer_reviews.text: On my third piece of paper this thing stopped working in the forward position, however it does work in reverse. How do i send it back or get a new one?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: A real workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I have burned out several shredders due to the amount of paperwork that I must make sure is safely destroyed. This is the best that I have used. It is quiet, handles more sheets than the cheap shredders and the result is very small particles that no one would bother to try to reconstruct. I have a small tax practice and need to shred prior year returns. This one does the job well! It is well built. The drawer is very easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: TaxPro

customer_reviews.title: It's a Jolly Good Fellowes
customer_reviews.text: This product is so highly rated, I doubt I will ever need to replace it, at my age. It is durable and quiet. Not only that, it will pulverize several sheets of paper at one time, and grind up small staples, like from a home stapler. I love it. Remember to also order some oil, although I think any vegetable oil will work. I oil my unit each time it needs to be emptied. It has made my end-of-year home shredding a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Routinely stops mid-shred
customer_reviews.text: Routinely stops mid-shred. You'll feed it some normal paper, and it'll shred like half way and just stop. You then have to reverse the paper, and feed it again. Sometimes it stops again, requiring 3 feeds. Other than that, when it works, it is great. The cut is very small. It just doesn't seem to work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Jung

customer_reviews.title: Well Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder. It's incredibly quiet and does the job. I run a small law firm and it's important that our discarded documents are sent to recycling with nothing identifiable. The Fellowes Powershred 62MC does the trick. Note: Make sure to oil the shredding device before the first use. I bought a can of vegetable cooking spray and sprayed it with that. Then spray it again each time you empty the shredder bin.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Bentjen

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: It was quiet and easy to use. Did not like that it would not stop operating until the basket was overflowing and made a mess emptying bin. Did not like that it quit operating after about 2 months after 1 year. I was shredding junk mail and it was a relatively small envelope. The type I had shredded many times before. Going to try the 15 sheet this time. My old Fellowes lasted 9 years. Lol. Guess we got our moneys worth on that one.sad, but nothing seems to last long these days.
customer_reviews.author: Bettym

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Noise level is very minor. Mobility is based on picking the whole thing up, the wheels on the bottom are junk. It handles 5 sheets of paper very well add one more and does start to bog down noticably. Overall happy with it but I'd recommend something else for the amount of money paid. Dosent seem like the best value but also not the worst. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have used this micro shredder for a few months now. I use this shredder to shred cardboard (Amazon boxes and recycled cardboard grocery boxes) which works great for worm compost bedding and I didn't think it would do the job but I am truly impressed on how great it has been shredding!! This shredder works and works without overheating. It is powerful and quiet, and the bucket for removal slides out, no removing the top.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Try, Try and now try again!  This model is not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Fellowes for 10 years. It was reliable and always worked. When it stopped working, I purchased another Fellowes with the same expectations. I was VERY wrong. It gets jammed with almost every pass. So, I ordered a different model and now I am stuck with this one. I should have returned it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder - worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - getting all my shredding done and my husband loves that the pieces are tiny - impossible to put back together equals much more secure in his mind. It has a removable bin in the front which is super handy - our last shredder didn't and I had to take off the heavy top and look to see if it was full. It was messier too - leaving pieces from the top on the floor when I took the bottom up to the bigger trash. Overall - just worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: L. Witten

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Durable
customer_reviews.text: In my search for a new shredder, I came across this one, and I am so glad I did. First of all, it was on sale for substantially cheaper than the list price. Also, the reviews raved about how quiet and efficient this shredder is. I gave it a shot and I can also speak highly of this product, just like the other reviews. The noise level is very low and the shredder is also durable (you can shred multiple pages with confidence). I also like how fine the documents are shredded. I would strongly recommend this shredder to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Glad someone told me about purchasing the oil ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Glad someone told me about purchasing the oil as well. Seems to be an important component for keeping your shredder in good working order for the (hopefully) long term.
customer_reviews.author: lisaw73

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes makes a great shredder.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for all the mail, catalogs, and the tons of paper products I receive. THE DELIVERY PERSON WAS TERRIBLE!! They refuse to read how to get in to the building. He called while I was at dinner in our dining room. My table mate let him in. Then he refused to follow instructions on where to go to put it at my apt. door. My friend Ira took it upstairs. It was very heavy. TRAIN THIS IMBECILES> THIS HAS HAPPENED BEFORE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: It's dead after 1  7 minute use!
customer_reviews.text: Powered up, check. Cut paper for 7 minutes, check. Shut off to cool down, check. Won't power up again - dead! Save your money and buy something cheap since this is apparently a 1 time use only!
customer_reviews.author: Shirl Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Micro shredder-great so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We will see if it lasts as long as our old Fellows shredder did. Jury still out on that.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Got 2 bad ones in a row.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received worked nice until it developed a squeak that shredder oil didn't fix. Sent it back. Replacement came and shredded paper was inside the bin and stuck in the blades, so the replacement was one someone else returned. Perhaps I got 2 lemons. The week it did work it was nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Spaderbabe

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought to securely dispose of medical paperwork. I have never had a shredder that is this quiet, ever, in my entire life, and I've used about six different ones. My dog doesn't even bark when I use it, and he barks at just about everything. Absolutely shreds the papers to dust. The wheels are durable and roll well, even on carpet. I do recommend buying the brand-name oil for it though. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: D.E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Jams!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shredder a few months ago -- but just took it out of the box and started using it today. Following the manufacturers guidelines, I have experienced 4 jams in the period of 1 hours. Unless you're going to shred one paper at a time -- don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Dan Finkelstein

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Our old fellows bit the dust, probably because I never oiled it in years and overfilled the bin. This one has a smaller bin however it works great. I love I do not have to remove the heavy cutting part, just pull out the bin to empty.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from an old Fellows shredder that served up over 10 years. I like how quiet this version is. We put grocery bags inside the basket because micro shredding creates a lot of fine particles and dust. The last thing you want to do is stir them up by emptying the basket into another container. The feed speed seems a bit slower then the old one, but that one was not a cheap model either, roughly the same price as this.
customer_reviews.author: electonics hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: This shredder does indeed shred.
customer_reviews.text: When we sold our home in June, the male buyer wanted the Fellows Shredder as part of the deal! We knew that we would eventually get a new one & we have. The shredder does a good job, little noisy but acceptable. The instructions advise turning it off when not in use, I miss that convenience but we cannot NOT have a shredder & as i stated previously, it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Macey

customer_reviews.title: Works great—  Does exactly what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, relatively quiet, not messy to dispose of the shreddings. Not for constant use, but for occasional use throughout the day. Much better than my previous Fellowes shredder which called it quits after a lot of use over 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Tepper

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy this again
customer_reviews.text: We return to the manufacture four times before it was fixed. They were very nice and so that was a positive but I would not buy this product again however it works very well but I’m wondering when it’s going to break again I had only had it a week and all of a sudden it didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with this unit. Make use of it everyday. Like the pull out basket feature and the micro cuts. Well worth the investment. Previously had a small desk top model same brand but a cross cut. Found myself using it more often than not and constantly cleaning it. Realised I needed a heavier duty unit. Cleaned it up the little one for the last time and gave it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Shredding old personal docs is much easier with this heavier duty shredder. The only down side I've encountered is the removable bucket inside that catches the shreds is deformed. It's bowed in on one side (poor quality control), so some of the shredded paper misses the bucket and goes into the bottom of the shredder. But as a machine that can shred my bills and personal docs, it's more than sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: El Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder & highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how the paper ends up looking like specs. Fellowes brand is well known for their shredders and I can agree. It’s just a little noisy when shredding but as long as it works well, I don’t mind. I ordered the maintenance supplies for this shredder so that it will last for years. It makes a difference to take care of all devices or products. I recommend this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Orly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this shredder
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this shredder. I had to replace a 9 year old Fellowes DS-1, and got this one after researching shredders. The shreds are much smaller and the motor is very quiet. I saw reviews complaining about loud noise, but disagree completely. This one rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Snider

customer_reviews.title: seems to work good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this shredder much yet, but will start now that tax time is here. I will be shredding all unneeded records and documents. I have done a small amount of shredding so far and it seems to work very good. Time will tell as I use it more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Stress Break

customer_reviews.title: Home shredder vs. 8 months of junk mail
customer_reviews.text: I saved up a lot of paper to shred to see how much mine could handle. It took about 30 min of nonstop shredding, then it needed around a 10 min break and it was good to go. Shredder 1 Junk mail 0
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a short amount of shredding, then permanently "overheated". But never used to the point of actually overheating.
customer_reviews.text: Used this unit over the course of about 1.5 years, for less than 2 buckets of shredding. Oiled as recommended in the manual, with exactly the oil recommended in the manual. One day turned it off after using it and it was working fine. The next day the red "overheated" light was on, permanently. Tried the "wait one hour" as suggested by the troubleshooting (even though it had been sitting doing nothing for the last 12 hours or so), and called tech support at Fellowes. All to no avail. Tech support said that it must be a "circuit board issue", and so the only recourse was to buy a new unit. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. McKown

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Is quiet enough that you can watch t v while shredding which is good. While the wheels make it roll nicely it needs a handle or something to push or pull it as not good go use cord and bending down and pushing doesn't work very well. Otherwise good product .
customer_reviews.author: oldladyblues

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several shredders at home over the years and none lasted. I bought a Fellows because they have a reputation of quality and durability. The amazing thing is how quiet this machine is while doing a tremendous job producing very small pieces of any sensitive material I choose to run through it. I like that it's on wheels and can be easily moved. I'm very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Douglas T. Furlich

customer_reviews.title: evrything I need for a home office
customer_reviews.text: ...shreds multiple pages at a time , reduces sheets to small particles.....easy to use ....well designed
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G Deana MD

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a shredder I love
customer_reviews.text: It has great features: casters, a lock, shreds to tiny dots, and is the perfect size. I always put in 3-4 sheets at a time, but I tried 10 once and it did them, but strained a little. I want this one to last, so I'm not pushing it. I oil it with the Fellows oil after I empty the bin, same reason. It does great with credit cards, and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Lyla Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Secure Shredding
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find any more confetti shredders; but this micro cut seems to have replaced them. In my opinion they’re slightly more secure although they have no staggered cuts, the size of the pieces, especially if they are mixed well, defy any reasonable readability or reassembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Clayton Cordell, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: Such tiny pieces. I love it. No more strips of paper. And I can feet 8-10 sheets quickly. Sure saves time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Solid Paper Shredder
customer_reviews.text: The paper shredder is an impressive product. The head unit is heavy enough to initially indicate that this is a solid shredder. So far, I love this paper shredder. It is a good size and does not take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have shredded bags and bags of documents and this did the trick. Bought another for my Mom to do the same. If you’re looking for a home-use shredder, I can’t imagine there’s a better one out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Northamer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really impressed with this machine. For having a P-5 security rating, I think this is a great deal for the money. I would question the total run time before a cool down period. I shredded 3/4 of a 13 gallon trash bag full of paper with no overheating and no problems. This machine chews up paper in extremely small pieces. I would hight recommend for anyone that is security minded. This shreddar will not disappoint..
customer_reviews.author: USMC 0311

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shredder We Have Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit high in price but worth every dollar. Wow, fantastic shredder! Shreds into tiny little pieces which means it holds a lot. We don't have to empty it for weeks and when we do it is very easy to empty. It is so quiet yet extremely efficient.
customer_reviews.author: JanisLE

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes 62MC 10-Sheet Micro-Cut Home and Office Paper Shredder
customer_reviews.text: It seems every few years your shredder goes on the fritz or has a jam you cant clear and you need to purchase a new one. Well welcome to my December 2019. This one has the same claims they all do. Hopefully it will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Ozgard

customer_reviews.title: It’s made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: Not well made. Off and on button is bad just not happy with it. Very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: HELEN MANNING

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Very Fine / No Regrets / Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. I am in the security industry and this cross cut is so fine I would consider it secure for all common uses in an office or home. (These are my opinions, not professional advise).
customer_reviews.author: JB Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice. Low noise and best security shred
customer_reviews.text: Product just arrived today. Have been using it since I put it together. Shredded old tax documents and pay stubs along with miscellaneous papers. Very low noise excellent maneuverability. Will update after more use. 5stars excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Yellowsuzi99

customer_reviews.title: This is a work horse!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is very easy to use - and has had plenty of use! Definitely a work horse! Doesn't jam (as long as you don't overload it). Quiet and quick. Perfect for our home office!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette S Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a 15 year old Fellowes that finally died. I chose this shredder because it seems it will be less messy to empty. No bags - the bin has a handle and it slides out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan V

customer_reviews.title: Good Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Someone suggested in a review that Fellowes cost more but were worth the additional cost. I agree. Did 5 pages per pass for some time with no issues. Did purchase oil to lubricate the blades. Very satisfied with this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: PhilSC

customer_reviews.title: Good at jamming
customer_reviews.text: Jammed after the fifth sheet of paper was feed into it. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Point For Security Level
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the shredders I have owned, this model is the best. Great price point for the security level. Very small shreds. Very quiet, too. The pullout bin makes disposable easy.
customer_reviews.author: NewOrleansJack

customer_reviews.title: What a great little shredder
customer_reviews.text: What a great little shredder, and it is a micro-cut to boot. Our old shredder, which was a regular cross-cut, had to be emptied 2-3 times per week. This one I change the bag every 2-3 weeks since the shred is much smaller. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tambra L. Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder I can recommend this product. It came as described and was easy to assemble. It operates as advertised and seems durable. It cuts great and shreds cards. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JustJoeyW

customer_reviews.title: Grown-Up Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: After using a cheap store brand shredder for years I finally upgraded to a grown-up shredder. Should have done it sooner! Whisper-quiet, quick, and easy to empty. Pieces are miniscule (so much safer than a cross-cut shredder). Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Paniccia

customer_reviews.title: Glad I splurged on this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the shredder for a week but I love it! It’s more than I wanted to spend on a shredder but after reading reviews of less expensive ones, I decided to spring for this one- I do not regret it. It shreds quietly, ripping the paper into tiny bits, hasn’t overheated at all, and is easy to move around. I’m so glad I decided to splurge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes is the hallmark of shredders!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old Fellowes finally quit after I sledge-hammered my palms few extra times to get it going over the last few months (issue with auto-sensing/revers switch) ;-) 62MC took over without a hitch and exceed in all expectations. Lastly, loving Amazons Fav Choice suggestions! Always on the mark!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathay777

customer_reviews.title: Great Home office shredder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a no-name brand I bought for $30 at MicroCenter failed after one shredding session. Using for my home office, mail, bank statements, etc. So far I am very impressed - the unit is powerful and relatively quiet. On first use I went through a pretty large stack of paper quickly and the unit never went into cool-down mode - even after about 20 minutes of continuous shredding. The shredder appears to be well built and I'm optimistic it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jimk

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes Shredders Mean Quality
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy being able to shred my papers and recycle them knowing they can't be pieced together by people who desire to claim others' identity. It's quiet, was very easy to assemble. Because I took the three year warranty , if something should go array, I can either have it repaired at no cost or have it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Macrina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is the best one I've used (in a home environment). Not much to say about its functionality since it works as expected. I detracted one star due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: I really love this shredder, it is by far the best I have ever had. It moves around on wheels and it has a window to see when to empty basket
customer_reviews.author: debra reed

customer_reviews.title: Shreds 6-7 sheets max
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't called 10-sheet paper shredder it would be four star but it jammed every time I put in exactly 10 sheets of paper. It also couldn't shred continuously for as long as stated in the manual before overheating. : (
customer_reviews.author: BrandNewReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder for home office
customer_reviews.text: Runs like a top. Shreds most everything I put thru it and it does not stop. After 7 minutes run time, it will take an unusually long cool down period (an hour). Could takes less IMHO bit overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Shreds paper to confetti size pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for shredding documents and protecting your identity. Shredded pieces are very small confetti size. Very happy to have purchased this machine with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Videomaker

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing is quiet. Shreds paper without skipping a beat. I did make sure to buy the oil for it as I didn’t for the last one and I killed it by not maintaining it.
customer_reviews.author: fernando

customer_reviews.title: Seems like quality machine
customer_reviews.text: We don't use it a lot. We wanted to replace an older model with a cracked housing. This machine is a lot sturdier and more capable than our oldd shredder, which was much nosier and could handle only two sheets at a time. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Chemist

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day when I open my mail ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day when I open my mail . Prevents paper build up. I forget to dump it out and sometimes and still keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: JoanAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funtional item - much more secure and to date, continues to run well
customer_reviews.text: Works well - Utilized for one person fee shop [appraisal business] - much more secure than previous shredders I have owned - I would repurchase
customer_reviews.author: PlanetHo

customer_reviews.title: I like it, because 1
customer_reviews.text: This product does as it says. I like it, because 1. its quiet 2. It reverses out of jams efficiently and 3. I can shred more papers because it shreds real real fine! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: H S

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is underpowered. Maybe can run 3 sheets of paper through without it stopping. My $59 Walmart shredder that died after 5 years was far superior to this underpowered piece of garbage. Bank statements and credit card bills have to be unfolded to feed through. More than three sheets—forget it! PURE JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: andy1116

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a much smaller Fellowes unit with this larger one. Works very well, smooth operation and fairly quiet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shredder for the money. Bin is easy to empty and it’s an attractive looking unit. Very efficient and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: An OK product but could be much better
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple shredder for home use. This one does the trick. My only complaints are: 1) this shredder produces an enormous amount of paper dust; and, 2) the bin is too small to fit in a paper grocery sack as a liner - which would make the thing a whole lot more convenient to empty. I don’t want to shop for and buy another plastic bag for a bin liner. Come on Fellowes... why couldn’t you all have thought of that?
customer_reviews.author: Tbone

customer_reviews.title: ... wife has used this shredder lots and is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this shredder lots and is very pleased with it. It is very quiet and does an excellent job of shredding. This is our second shredder from Fellows. The is a cross cut one; previous one that we have had for over 10 years still works fine, shredding in strips. We will use both of them. Fellows make excellent shredders; highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Klemenhagen

customer_reviews.title: The waste receptical is kind of light and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have owned several shredders over the years, and to say we are rough on them is an understatement.We burned up most of them in less than a year. It took almost 2 years to smoke one of these. So I ordered another one. Its the toughest shredder that we have found. The waste receptical is kind of light and flimsy, the shredder itself is like a sack of bricks, but it works great. And when this one dies I'm ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Faced with large scale records reduction I purchased this.... It keeps going without a stumble when properly maintained/oiled
customer_reviews.author: Pcst

customer_reviews.title: Excellant shredder.
customer_reviews.text: Shreds quickly and shreds into the smallest of any I've had. Also goes right through old credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight  Halbert

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The noise level is so much better than the older models -- and it's pretty powerful. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality- makes crumbs of documents. This also reduces shred volume. Very quite, has never jammed, 'eats' through everything so far- cards, CDs, stacks of paper, cardboard ( mailer-type) junk mail in envelopes, stickies, staples.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome spreader It does everything that I was looking for . Very quiet with a large holding capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder--performs as expected, and quieter than any shredder I've ever owned! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lola2000

customer_reviews.title: excellent shredder
customer_reviews.text: works great! my previous fellowes shredder lasted 15* years, hopes this is a repeat!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Reliable shredder
customer_reviews.text: Shredder is comparable to my Fellows 15-sheet shredder. It actually shreds more than 10 sheets. Worth the money for reliability.
customer_reviews.author: JDMTSX

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder. It turns your paper into confetti. Very happy with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

product_meta.title: Fellowes 62MC 10-Sheet Micro-Cut Home and Office Paper Shredder with Safety Lock for Added Protection (4685101),Black
product_meta.description: Style:CastersThe Fellowes Microshred 62MC Micro-Cut Shredder can shred up to 10 sheets of paper per pass into 2011 (7/64"x 25/64") micro-cut particles providing superior protection of your most confidential documents (Security Level P- 4). This machine also safely shreds credit cards and staples. To protect more than your identity, the patented Safety Lock feature disables the shredder when moved to the lock position for added safety protection. Also, with the Quiet Operation feature, the 62MC provides quiet shredding performance for shared workspaces. With the ability to shred for up to 7 minutes before a cool down period is needed, the 62MC shredder is ideal for personal deskside use and includes a 5-gallon pull-out waste bin that helps keeps your workspace clean and casters for easy mobility.. Backed by a worry-free 1-year product and service warranty plus a 5-year cutter warranty. 18.75" H x 13.75" W x 10.44" D. Amps: 3.5.
feature_bullets: Fellowes shredder shreds 10 sheets of paper per pass into 2,011 (7/64” x 25/64”) micro cut particles (Security Level P-4); Shredder can also destroy staples and credit cards
Powerful confetti shredder with shreds up to 6x smaller than standard cross-cut shreds
Safety Lock feature disables shredder when not in use for added safety protection
Quiet Operation helps to eliminate noisy disruptions in shared office environments
Includes 5 gallon pull-out waste bin that helps keeps workspace clean and casters for easy mobility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars698 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
